WorkItem.Description:
It might be a good idea to allow NuGet users to install PRISM components independently. It would be nice if I could mix and match technologies and not carry around unnecessary elements.
For example EvengAggregator is rendered obsolete by RX Extensions library. I would like to use rest of the library except EventAggregator. With remote deployment and SL, when you have to download modules over and over, every byte countsâ€¦
This item related to proposed Item # 9118

Comments.Message: This is complete for WPF in Prism 5.0. In your case, you are asking for it in Silverlight which is not complete.
